description: A settlement located at the juncture of the Jordan and Jezreel valleys, Scythopolis/Nysa had important Egyptian through Roman phases.

names.details: Beysān: One of the towns of the Jordan (Ürdün) region, it is for the most part a pleasant small town, marked by low prices and an abundance of fruits and produce. [translation]
